name: Fabricate Bullets
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (1 pound of lead or other soft metal worth 2 gp)
text: You convert 1 pound of lead into bullets. When you cast this spell, you decide whether you create normal sling bullets, firearm bullets, or firearm pellets. The spell creates two sling bullets, 30 firearm bullets, or 10 uses of pellets.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (价值2GP的一磅铅或其他软金属)
text_zh:
你将一磅重的铅转化为弹药。

当你施放该法术时，要决定创造的弹丸种类：普通的投石索弹丸（Sling bullets）、火器弹头（firearm bullets）或火器散弹（firearm pellets）。

这个法术能制造出两颗投石索弹丸，30颗火器子弹或10份小钢珠弹药。
